articles.title: Atomic point contact significantly enhances Raman scattering - European Pharmaceutical Review
articles.description: New research shows that allowing the point of a tip-enhanced Raman spectrometer to touch the surface of a sample increases sensitivity.
articles.content:
Posted: 10 May 2021 | Hannah Balfour (European Pharmaceutical Review) | No comments yet
